system.description:
Shortly after becoming a pilot, you realized something: that machine you pilot is powered by a series of cascading nuclear reactions. Why not open that compartment up and see what sort of damage it can do?

Rank I: Aggressive Heat Bleed

The first attack you make on your turn while in the DANGER ZONE deals +2 HEAT on a hit.

If you enter the DANGER ZONE during your turn, this talent takes effect on your next attack.

Rank II: Fusion Hemorrhage

The first ranged or melee attack roll you make on your turn while in the DANGER ZONE deals ENERGY damage instead of KINETIC or EXPLOSIVE and additionally deals +1d6 ENERGY bonus damage on a hit.

Rank III: Here, Catch!

You've modified your mech to launch its superheated fuel rods at enemies. Gain the Fuel Rod Gun weapon as an integrated mount.
